sentences.en: A sound image localization experiment proves the result of theoretical analysis.
sentences.cn: 声像定位实验证实了理论分析.

sentences.en: ActiveModel ( ASM ) is a method for object localization based on statistic model.
sentences.cn: ASM 是一种基于统计模型的目标定位方法.

sentences.en: Based on genetic algorithm wireless sensor network localization algorithm simulation.
sentences.cn: 基于遗传算法的无线传感器网络定位算法仿真.

sentences.en: E 20 - GPD was located in cytoplasm by analyzing for subcellular localization.
sentences.cn: 亚细胞定位分析显示,E20-GPD定位于细胞质中.

sentences.en: Experimental results show that this localization method is effective and corrective.
sentences.cn: 实验结果表明了该方法的可行性和有效性.

sentences.en: In a separate archive is the official localization and universal activator.
sentences.cn: 在单独的存档是正式的本地化和普遍激活.

sentences.en: Localization is a component in various successful mobile robot systems.
sentences.cn: 自主定位是移动机器人研究领域的重要课题.

sentences.en: Localizers need to know about them in order to provide consistent localization.
sentences.cn: 本地化人员需要了解这些要求,才能提供一致的本地化.

sentences.en: Our Company is seeking experienced translators for a potential volume localization project.
sentences.cn: 我们的公司正在寻求有经验的笔译潜在大量本地化项目.

sentences.en: Particles have the property of definite localization in space and definite boundaries.
sentences.cn: 粒子的性质是在空间有确定的位置,有清楚的边界.

sentences.en: Product localization: Natural, the environmental protection, really pure, the health care, is lofty.
sentences.cn: 产品定位: 天然 、 环保 、 真纯 、 保健 、 高雅.

sentences.en: The localization can be considered uncertain to this extent.
sentences.cn: 在这个程度上局部化可以认为是不明确的.

sentences.en: The strain localization had a close relation with the failure process.
sentences.cn: 应变局部化的发展与土坡破坏有着密切联系.

sentences.en: The third part quests the reality significance and localization ofof neutralization.
sentences.cn: 第三部分分析了“中和”之美的现实意义和局限性.

sentences.en: We put more emphasis on modules and localization.
sentences.cn: 我们更多的强调了模和局部化.

words.tran_cn: 当地的；局部的；地方性的；乡土的
局部的；地区的；小范围的
[计] 局部；当地居民；本地新闻
有地方色彩，地方主义；方言
定位信标；[计] 定位器（等于localiser）
使地方化；定位；局限（localise的过去分词）
找出；安置；确定…的位置（locate的ing形式）
使地方化；使局部化；停留在一地方

trans.tran_cn: 地方化，局限，定位，定域，局部化
